user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Amazon mobile website, featuring a search bar at the top and navigation links for various categories like Deals and Best Sellers. Below, there are highlighted sections promoting early Black Friday deals and product categories such as "Great holiday gifts," "Oculus," "Women's Fashion," and "Home & Kitchen Under $30." The page also shows a banner offering home essentials under $50 and the option to shop for items in different regions, like delivering to the Netherlands. The layout suggests an easy way to browse promotions and product categories.
